name: Escape The Loop (itch) (IAAndrei)
description:
Welcome to Escape The Loop !

This game was created as an entry for the Ludum Dare #47 game jam which had the theme: Stuck in a loop!

The premise of the game is that you just enter an escape room one day, and you have got to do your usual tasks to exit it... however, many of the tasks are deceiving, or have tricks within them that you may not observe at first glance!

You have to find out the correct 5 digit code in order to truly become free, otherwise, if you find the other 5 digit code, you've been deceived and once you enter the exit door you find out that you're back at the beginning. This repeats until you find the good code, it is a loop.

I wish you the best of luck and patience in the game... and have fun!

Created in 24 hours by Iulian Andrei / Argon Bright
